name: The Cursed One (Omer Faruk Yilmaz)
description:
This game is a project I made for a school project and is my reference for job applications. There is no financial gain.

Do not play in full screen for a better experience. This game is actually a mobile game.

This is a beta version. I will publish it on Play Store.

I'm not that good at UI/UX so it's a bit weak. I tried to work proportionately though. Codes and performances have been optimized as much as I can.

High scores won't work as it needs to have a .json file to hold the data.

Developer:  Ömer Faruk Yılmaz
